DOC.brief_summary: This two-part study ( Part I/Part II ) . Part I design determine effect low high fat meal pharmacokinetics single dose pazopanib ( GW572016 ) . Part II design allow patient continue access study drug multiple dose regimen . Patients receive clinical benefit regimen go long term rollover study VEG105430 provide stable 8 week .
DOC.brief_title: A Two-way Crossover Study Of The Effect Of Food On The Pharmacokinetics Of Pazopanib In Cancer Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Confirmed advance solid tumor ( ) Must adequate blood , liver , kidney function . Must willing abstain intercourse 2 week prior administration first dose study medication 28 day final dose study medication willing consistently correctly use acceptable method birth control . Exclusion criterion : Patients certain heart problem history bleed within month .
DOC.keyword: Pazopanib GW786034 Advanced cancer Metastatic cancer
